segments.text: Taking in the whole kitchen view from this angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the sink, drying dishes with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbelievably, water is cascading over the basin's edge nonstop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle spreads across the floor toward her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's gross how it's wetting everything without notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The counter holds more dishes, ready for her attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the left, the cookie jar sits in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on tiptoes on that wobbly stool, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might crash down, breaking something or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A plate in his other hand adds to the instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is all eyes and reaching hand, excited for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little heist is bold, I have to admit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the fenced garden looks serene under daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It highlights how fragile this domestic peace is.
segments.speaker: PAR
